languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс морщится и с сомнением смотрит наверх.{/n} "Я могу ошибаться, потому что на этой клятой планете хватает варп-источников, но все же — как будто эхо Имматериума сверху доносится..."

{n}Heinrix grimaces and looks up with a doubtful expression.{/n} "I could be wrong, seeing as this accursed planet has too many sources of warp energies, but I seem to sense an echo of the Immaterium coming from above..."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс морщится и с сомнением смотрит наверх.{/n} "Я могу ошибаться, потому что на этой клятой планете хватает варп-источников, но все же — как будто эхо Имматериума сверху доносится..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix grimaces and looks up with a doubtful expression.{/n} "I could be wrong, seeing as this accursed planet has too many sources of warp energies, but I seem to sense an echo of the Immaterium coming from above..."

{n}Heinrix grimaces and looks up with a doubtful expression.{/n} "I could be wrong, seeing as this accursed planet has too many sources of warp energies, but I seem to sense an echo of the Immaterium coming from above..."
"I will tear this accursed castle apart stone by stone if von Valancius isn't standing in front of me in the next five minutes!"

{n}Heinrix grimaces and looks up with a doubtful expression.{/n} "I could be wrong, seeing as this accursed planet has too many sources of warp energies, but I seem to sense an echo of the Immaterium coming from above..."

{n}Heinrix grimaces and looks up with a doubtful expression.{/n} "I could be wrong, seeing as this accursed planet has too many sources of warp energies, but I seem to sense an echo of the Immaterium coming from above..."

languages.text: {n}海因里希皱着眉，抬起头，脸上满是怀疑的神色。{/n}“或许是我的错觉，毕竟这颗被诅咒的行星上有太多亚空间能量源。不过，我似乎感觉到上面传来了亚空间的回声……”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix grimaces and looks up with a doubtful expression.{/n} "I could be wrong, seeing as this accursed planet has too many sources of warp energies, but I seem to sense an echo of the Immaterium coming from above..."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希皱着眉，抬起头，脸上满是怀疑的神色。{/n}“或许是我的错觉，毕竟这颗被诅咒的行星上有太多亚空间能量源。不过，我似乎感觉到上面传来了亚空间的回声……”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix hace una mueca y, con gesto dudoso, levanta la mirada.{/n} «Podría equivocarme, dada la abundancia de energías de disformidad en este condenado planeta, pero creo que percibo un eco del Inmaterio desde arriba...».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix grimaces and looks up with a doubtful expression.{/n} "I could be wrong, seeing as this accursed planet has too many sources of warp energies, but I seem to sense an echo of the Immaterium coming from above..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix hace una mueca y, con gesto dudoso, levanta la mirada.{/n} «Podría equivocarme, dada la abundancia de energías de disformidad en este condenado planeta, pero creo que percibo un eco del Inmaterio desde arriba...».

languages.text: {n}Yüzünü buruşturan Heinrix, şüpheli bir ifadeyle yukarı bakıyor.{/n} "Bu lanetli gezegende çok fazla öteboyut enerjisi kaynağı olduğundan yanılıyor olabilirim ama yukarıda Tindiyar'ın yankısını hissettim sanki..."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix grimaces and looks up with a doubtful expression.{/n} "I could be wrong, seeing as this accursed planet has too many sources of warp energies, but I seem to sense an echo of the Immaterium coming from above..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yüzünü buruşturan Heinrix, şüpheli bir ifadeyle yukarı bakıyor.{/n} "Bu lanetli gezegende çok fazla öteboyut enerjisi kaynağı olduğundan yanılıyor olabilirim ama yukarıda Tindiyar'ın yankısını hissettim sanki..."

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは顔をしかめ、疑わしげな表情で見上げた。{/n}「この呪われた惑星には〈歪み〉のエネルギー源が多すぎるから、俺の勘違いかもしれんが…上の方から、非物質世界の残響のようなものを感じるような…」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix grimaces and looks up with a doubtful expression.{/n} "I could be wrong, seeing as this accursed planet has too many sources of warp energies, but I seem to sense an echo of the Immaterium coming from above..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは顔をしかめ、疑わしげな表情で見上げた。{/n}「この呪われた惑星には〈歪み〉のエネルギー源が多すぎるから、俺の勘違いかもしれんが…上の方から、非物質世界の残響のようなものを感じるような…」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix grimace et vous lance un regard mal assuré.{/n} « Je me trompe peut-être, vu que cette maudite planète fourmille de sources d'énergie du Warp, mais je crois percevoir un écho de l'Immaterium qui émane d'au-dessus de nous... »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix grimaces and looks up with a doubtful expression.{/n} "I could be wrong, seeing as this accursed planet has too many sources of warp energies, but I seem to sense an echo of the Immaterium coming from above..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix grimace et vous lance un regard mal assuré.{/n} « Je me trompe peut-être, vu que cette maudite planète fourmille de sources d'énergie du Warp, mais je crois percevoir un écho de l'Immaterium qui émane d'au-dessus de nous... »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix verzieht das Gesicht und sieht dich zweifelnd an.{/n} "Kann sein, dass ich mich irre, weil dieser verfluchte Planet zu viele Quellen von Warpenergie hat, aber ich spüre ein Echo des Immateriums von oben ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix grimaces and looks up with a doubtful expression.{/n} "I could be wrong, seeing as this accursed planet has too many sources of warp energies, but I seem to sense an echo of the Immaterium coming from above..."
